com.feilong.servlet.http

Class ResponseUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.feilong.servlet.http.ResponseUtil

  • public final class ResponseUtil
extends Object
    HttpServletResponse 工具类.

    关于 RequestDispatcher.forward 和 HttpServletResponse.sendRedirect

    RequestDispatcher.forward HttpServletResponse.sendRedirect
    只能将请求转发给同一个Web应用中的组件; 可以定向到应用程序外的其他资源.
    重定向后URL不会改变; URL会改变
    在服务器端内部将请求转发给另一个资源, 浏览器只知道发出请求并得到相应结果,并不知在服务器内部发生的转发行为 对浏览器的请求直接作出响应,响应的结果告诉浏览器重新发出对另外一个URL的访问请求
    调用者与被调用者之间共享相同的request、response对象,它们属于同一个访问请求和相应过程; 调用者和被调用者使用各自的request、response对象,它们属于两个独立的访问请求和相应过程
    适用于一次请求响应过程由Web程序内部的多个资源来协同完成, 需要在同一个Web程序内部资源之间跳转, 使用 ServletRequest.setAttribute(String, Object)方法将预处理结果传递给下一个资源. 适用于不同Web程序之间的重定向.

    关于 HttpServletResponse.sendRedirect(String):

    用于生成302响应码和Location响应头,从而通知客户端重新访问Location响应头指定的URL.

    在 HttpServletResponse.sendRedirect(String)之后,应该紧跟一句return;
    我们已知道 HttpServletResponse.sendRedirect(String)是通过浏览器来做转向的,所以只有在页面处理完成后,才会有实际的动作.
    既然您已要做转向了,那么后的输出更有什么意义呢？而且有可能会因为后面的输出导致转向失败.

    Since:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    feilong
    See Also:
    HttpServletResponse

    • Method Detail

      • sendRedirect

        public static void sendRedirect(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response,
                                String url)
        跳转.

        HttpServletResponse.sendRedirect(String)方法用于生成302响应码和Location响应头,从而通知客户端重新访问Location响应头指定的URL.

        在 HttpServletResponse.sendRedirect(String)之后,应该紧跟一句return;;
        我们已知道 HttpServletResponse.sendRedirect(String)是通过浏览器来做转向的,所以只有在页面处理完成后,才会有实际的动作.
        既然您已要做转向了,那么后的输出更有什么意义呢？而且有可能会因为后面的输出导致转向失败.

        如果 url 是null,抛出 NullPointerException
        如果 url 是blank,抛出 IllegalArgumentException

        Parameters:
        response - the response
        url - the redirect location URL
        Since:
        1.2.2
        See Also:
        HttpServletResponse.sendRedirect(String)

      • sendError

        public static void sendError(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response,
                             int errorStatusCode)
        Sends an error response to the client using the specified status code and clears the buffer. The server will preserve cookies and may clear or update any headers needed to serve the error page as a valid response. If an error-page declaration has been made for the web application corresponding to the status code passed in, it will be served back the error page

        If the response has already been committed, this method throws an IllegalStateException. After using this method, the response should be considered to be committed and should not be written to.

        Parameters:
        response - the response
        errorStatusCode - 错误码
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - If the response was committed before this method call
        Since:
        1.11.5

      • sendError

        public static void sendError(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response,
                             int errorStatusCode,
                             String errorMessage)
        Sends an error response to the client using the specified status and clears the buffer. The server defaults to creating the response to look like an HTML-formatted server error page containing the specified message, setting the content type to "text/html". The server will preserve cookies and may clear or update any headers needed to serve the error page as a valid response. If an error-page declaration has been made for the web application corresponding to the status code passed in, it will be served back in preference to the suggested msg parameter and the msg parameter will be ignored.

        If the response has already been committed, this method throws an IllegalStateException. After using this method, the response should be considered to be committed and should not be written to.

        Parameters:
        response - the response
        errorStatusCode - 错误码
        errorMessage - the descriptive message
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - If the response was committed before this method call
        Since:
        1.11.5

      • setNoCacheHeader

        public static void setNoCacheHeader(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
        设置页面不缓存.

        当HTTP1.1服务器指定 CacheControl = no-cache时,浏览器就不会缓存该网页.
        旧式 HTTP1.0 服务器不能使用 Cache-Control 标题

        注意:

        仅仅设置 Cache-Control:no-cache,如 

         <meta http-equiv="Cache-Control" content="no-cache" />
     <meta http-equiv="Pragma" content="no-cache" />
     <meta http-equiv="Expires" content="0" />

        在 chrome 浏览器下面不起作用, 需要设置成 Cache-Control:no-cache,no-store,参见 google-chrome-cache

        We see the same here: Chrome no cache需要 明确指定 no-store.如果不设置,那么 must-revalidate+ETag 没有效果, 并且 页面都会被 cached while they should not be since Chrome does not check for a 304 at all.

        Parameters:
        response - HttpServletResponse
        See Also:
        google-chrome-cache, Cache doesnt adhear to No cache options(需要翻墙), chrome http_response_headers源码, HttpHeaders.CACHE_CONTROL, HttpHeaders.PRAGMA, HttpHeaders.EXPIRES

      • setCacheHeader

        public static void setCacheHeader(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response,
                                  int cacheTime)
        设置页面缓存.

        过期时间 = max-age 属性,单位秒.

        Parameters:
        response - the response
        cacheTime - 过期时间 = max-age 属性,单位秒,建议使用TimeInterval里面定义的常量.

        if cacheTime <=0 表示不缓存
        默认:0 不缓存

        设置为int类型,int 最大值是Integer.MAX_VALUE 为 68.096259734906年,参见 TimeInterval ,绝对够用了
        Since:
        1.5.3, 1.11.0 if cacheTime <=0 表示不缓存
        See Also:
        HttpHeaders.CACHE_CONTROL

      • write

        public static void write(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response,
                         Object content)
        输出.

        response - HttpServletResponse
        content - 相应内容
        See Also:

      • write

        public static void write(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response,
                         Object content,
                         String contentType,
                         String characterEncoding)
        输出.
        Parameters:
        response - HttpServletResponse
        content - 相应内容
        contentType - 内容类型, 可以为null或者empty;
        如果不为null或者empty,将会设置 ServletResponse.setContentType(String)
        characterEncoding - 字符编码,建议使用 CharsetType 定义好的常量;
        可以为null或者empty;
        如果不为null或者empty,将会设置 ServletResponse.setCharacterEncoding(String)
        Since:
        1.0.9
        See Also:
        ServletResponse.getWriter(), PrintWriter.print(Object), PrintWriter.flush()
